title: Set max-width to 300px for inline images and GIFs

requirements.text: Set max-width to 300px for inline images and GIFs in their non-expanded state in the MessageBubble component without changing any other styles or functionality

quotes: lets make the max-width for inline images and gifs 300px (non-expanded). dont change any styles or make any changes other than this.

acceptanceCriteria: Inline images in messages display with a maximum width of 300px when not expanded
Inline GIFs in messages display with a maximum width of 300px when not expanded
No other styles or functionality are modified

constraints: Only modify the max-width property for inline images and GIFs
Do not change any other styles or make any other modifications
Preserve all existing functionality including expand/collapse behavior
